questions.question: This term refers to the set of tools and technologies used to manage and secure mobile devices, applications, and data in an enterprise environment.
This component of EMM focuses on managing and securing mobile applications used by employees.
This component of EMM involves managing and securing mobile devices such as smartphones and tablets.
This term refers to the practice of allowing employees to use their personal devices for work purposes while ensuring security and compliance.
questions.answer: What is Bring Your Own Device (BYOD)?

questions.question: This technology is commonly used in EMM to enforce security policies and ensure compliance on mobile devices.
